wins: Successfully followed my trading plan and stayed disciplined during market volatility
losses: Got caught up in FOMO and entered a position without proper analysis
lessons: Emotional control is key - need to stick to my checklist before every trade
emotionalInsights: I notice I trade better when my emotion level is between 6-7, not too anxious or overconfident
nextWeekGoals: Focus on position sizing and risk management, maximum 2% per trade
